contentMeta.headline: Pope Francis celebrates mass with the ritual of the blessing of the palliums
contentMeta.description: Pope Francis celebrates the mass with the ritual of the blessing of the palliums for the new Metropolitan Archbishops on the occasion of the feast of Romes patrons saints, Peter and Paul in Saint Peter Basilica, Vatican City, 29 June 2018. ANSA/GIUSEPPE LAMI
